client.session.php

00001 <?php
00002 
00003 /**
00004  * @package kata_component
00005  */
00006 
00007 /**
00008  * A component for object oriented session handling using encrypted client-side cookies.
00009  * keep in mind: this cookie is very big and is sent on EVERY request!
00010  * 
00011  * @author feldkamp@gameforge.de
00012  * @package kata_component
00013  * @ignore
00014  */
00015 class SessionComponent extends baseSessionComponent {
00016 
00017          /**
00018           * placeholder for decoded session data 
00019           */
00020          protected $sessionData = array ();
00021 
00022          /**
00023           * setting some ini-parameters and starting the actual session
00024           */
00025          protected function startupSession() {
00026                   $this->initCookie();
00027          }
00028 
00029          ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00030 
00031          /**
00032           * calculate the hash we use to check if the data is still valid
00033           */
00034          protected function calculateHash() {
00035                   return md5(serialize($this->sessionData) . SESSION_STRING);
00036          }
00037 
00038          /**
00039           * did we already decode the session?
00040           * @var boolean
00041           */
00042          protected $isSessionDecoded = false;
00043 
00044          /**
00045           * decode the session if not already done.
00046           * throws SessionFailureException if strange things happen. 
00047           */
00048          protected function decodeSession() {
00049                   if ($this->isSessionDecoded) {
00050                            return;
00051                   }
00052 
00053                   if (!empty ($_COOKIE[SESSION_COOKIE])) {
00054                            $data = base64_decode($_COOKIE[SESSION_COOKIE]);
00055                            if (false === $data) {
00056                                     return;
00057                            }
00058 
00059                            $data = gzinflate($data);
00060                            if (false === $data) {
00061                                     return;
00062                            }
00063 
00064                            $this->sessionData = unserialize($data);
00065                            if (false === $this->sessionData) {
00066                                     $this->sessionData = array ();
00067                                     return;
00068                            }
00069 
00070                            $hash = is($this->sessionData['Config.hash'], '');
00071                            unset ($this->sessionData['Config.hash']);
00072                            if ($hash != $this->calculateHash()) {
00073                                     $this->sessionData = array ();
00074                                     return;
00075                            }
00076                   }
00077 
00078                   $this->isSessionDecoded = true;
00079          }
00080 
00081          protected function encodeSession() {
00082                   $this->sessionData['Config.hash'] = $this->calculateHash();
00083                   $data = base64_encode(gzdeflate(serialize($this->sessionData)));
00084                   unset ($this->sessionData['Config.hash']);
00085 
00086                   setcookie(SESSION_COOKIE, $data, time() + SESSION_TIMEOUT, $this->path, $this->domain);
00087          }
00088 
00089          /**
00090           * read value(s) from the session container.
00091           * returns all currently set values if called with null
00092           * returns null when nothing could be found under the name you gave
00093           * @param string $name name under which the value(s) are to find
00094           */
00095          public function read($name = null) {
00096                   if (CLI) {
00097                            return false;
00098                   }
00099                   if ($this->initSession(true)) {
00100                            $this->decodeSession();
00101                            if (empty ($name)) {
00102                                     return $this->sessionData;
00103                            }
00104                            if (isset ($this->sessionData[$name])) {
00105                                     return $this->sessionData[$name];
00106                            }
00107                   }
00108                   return null;
00109          }
00110 
00111          /**
00112           * write mixed values to the session-component.
00113           * @param string $name identifier, may contain alphanumeric characters or .-_
00114           * @param mixed $value values to store
00115           */
00116          public function write($name, $value) {
00117                   if (parent :: preamble($name, false)) {
00118                            $this->decodeSession();
00119                            $this->sessionData[$name] = $value;
00120                            $this->encodeSession();
00121                            return true;
00122                   }
00123                   return false;
00124          }
00125 
00126          /**
00127           * write multiple key value arrays to session-component
00128           * @param $arr array with key-value pairs
00129           */
00130          public function writeArray($arr) {
00131                   if (CLI) {
00132                            return false;
00133                   }
00134                   if ($this->initSession(false)) {
00135                            $this->decodeSession();
00136                            foreach ($arr as $k => $v) {
00137                                     $this->validateKeyName($k);
00138                                     $this->sessionData[$k] = $v;
00139                            }
00140                            $this->encodeSession();
00141                            return true;
00142                   }
00143                   return false;
00144          }
00145 
00146          /**
00147           * delete values stored under given name from the session-container
00148           * @param string $name identifier
00149           */
00150          public function delete($name) {
00151                   if (parent :: preamble($name, false)) {
00152                            $this->decodeSession();
00153                            unset ($this->sessionData[$name]);
00154                            $this->encodeSession();
00155                            return true;
00156                   }
00157                   return false;
00158          }
00159 
00160          /**
00161           * destroy any current session and all variables stored in the session-container with it
00162           */
00163          public function destroy() {
00164                   $this->sessionData = array ();
00165                   $this->clearCookie();
00166          }
00167 }
